member.name: P:SymOntoClay.Threading.IThreadTask.IsCanceled
member.summary: Gets whether this task has completed execution due to being canceled.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.Threading.IThreadTask.IsCompleted
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the task has completed.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.Threading.IThreadTask.IsCompletedSuccessfully
member.summary: Gets whether the task ran to completion.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.Threading.IThreadTask.IsFaulted
member.summary: Gets whether the task completed due to an unhandled exception.

member.name: M:SymOntoClay.Threading.IThreadTask.Wait
member.summary: Waits for the to complete execution.

member.name: P:SymOntoClay.Threading.IThreadTask`1.Result
member.summary: Gets the result value of this .

member.name: T:SymOntoClay.Threading.ThreadTask
member.summary: Represents an asynchronous operation. This is a wrapper over Thread.

member.name: T:SymOntoClay.Threading.ThreadTaskStatus
member.summary: Represents the current stage in the lifecycle of a .

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.Threading.ThreadTaskStatus.Created
member.summary: The task has been initialized but has not yet been scheduled.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.Threading.ThreadTaskStatus.WaitingForActivation
member.summary: The task is waiting to be activated and scheduled.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.Threading.ThreadTaskStatus.WaitingToRun
member.summary: The task has been scheduled for execution but has not yet begun executing.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.Threading.ThreadTaskStatus.Running
member.summary: The task is running but has not yet completed.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.Threading.ThreadTaskStatus.WaitingForChildrenToComplete
member.summary: The task has finished executing and is implicitly waiting for attached child tasks to complete.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.Threading.ThreadTaskStatus.Canceled
member.summary: The task acknowledged cancellation by throwing an with its own while the token was in signaled state, or the task's was already signaled before the task started executing.

member.name: F:SymOntoClay.Threading.ThreadTaskStatus.Faulted
member.summary: The task completed due to an unhandled exception.
